instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
threads.message:
I have 2 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> both have liquid damage, both ultrasonic cleaned, and both do turn on, and work, except there is no image or backlight, 

here are the following readings:

<CHIP>U8339</CHIP>
pin 1: 0
pin 2: 0
pin 3: 0 (gets 3.3v for a few seconds after plug in charger)
pin 4: 0
pin 5: 0
pin 6: 0
pin 7: 0
pin 8:3.3v 

U 7700

pin 1: 0
pin 2: 0
pin 3: 0
pin 4: 0
pin 5: 5v 
pin 6: 5v
pin 7: 9
pin 8: 5
pin 9: 12.55
pin 10: 12.55
pin 11: 12.39v 
pin 12: 0
pin 13: 0
pin 14: 2.3 (slowly drops to 0 then back up to 2.3)
pin 15: 0
pin 16: 5.13v
pin 17: 0
pin 18: 5.13v

F7700

Pin 1: 12.55v
Pin 2: 12.55v

<TRANSISTOR>Q7700</TRANSISTOR>

pin 1: 0
pin 2: 0
pin 3: 12.40v
pin 4: 12.55v
pin 5: 0
pin 6: 0

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
threads.message: Are you using a known good LCD from a 2015 model? 2014 LCD will not work!

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
threads.message: I tested 2014 screen on 4924 and works, but need to load os x and take 1 minute.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
threads.message: Yes, i have a pile of 2015 previously repaired 2015 screens, so tested a few of them just for backlight :/

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
threads.message: You can have repaired screens but are they known good? Pretty easy to stick a new 2014 LCD panel in a 2015 assembly and have it not work.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
threads.message: Problem solved, problem was board. fixed both of them, LCD displays were good.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
threads.message: Would be nice to know what was the issue.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> NO BACKLIGHT OR IMAGE - Previously liquid damaged (2 logic boards)
